articles.title: Indian fintechs record 63% decline in funding, see single unicorn in one year - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Late-stage rounds in 2023 were down by 56% at $1.4 billion while early stage and seed-stage rounds dropped by 73% and 69%, respectively
